software.description: BASH Scripts for a resting-state functional MRI study. The functions include seed-based correlation analysis, amplitude analysis and independent component analysis. Note: this tool is just a plug-in for FSL, AFNI and FreeSurfer. Thus, you need have them before you use BASH4RfMRI. Of note: most functions have been integrated in 1000 Functional Connectomes Project (www.nitrc.org/projects/fcon_1000). I do not update this package, thus please visit 1000 Functional Connectomes Project site and download relevant bash scripts.
